commit message:
Don't show deck upgrade wizard on AnkiDroid version upgrade.

The upgrade wizard will stlil appear on any startup if you have no collection.anki2 file and at least one old .anki file in the AnkiDroid directory. There is also a menu option to manually trigger the wizard.
Add automatic database check on version upgrade.

Merge pull request #93 from hssm/v2.0.2-dev-release-notes

Release notes screen for 2.0.2. Now also includes link to issue tracker.

Merge pull request #92 from hssm/v2.0.2-dev-dbcheck-on-upgrade

On upgrade, do a DB check and don't show upgrade wizard

Merge pull request #94 from hssm/v2.0.2-thread-cancel

Fix for Issue 1840 - Handle thread cancellation
Bumped version code so that the APK can be uploaded to the new Play Store beta feature
